item.title: Hacknote
item.author: ido
item.description: Introduction We are facing a 32 bit closed-source binary. The binary follows a simple functionallity: ---------------------- HackNote ---------------------- 1. Add note 2. Delete note 3. Print note 4. Exit ---------------------- The binary lacks PIE and features Partial RELRO. Reversing Let’s now review the functions associated with each option.
